item.title: CVE-2024-44028|2024-10-06T12:40:26.014Z -- nicejob -- nicejob
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Nicejob NiceJob allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NiceJob: from n/a before 3.6.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-44025|2024-10-06T12:44:14.749Z -- nicejob -- nicejob
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nicejob NiceJob allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NiceJob: from n/a before 3.6.5.
